document.full_text: pioneering newsman joseph wershba, whose work helped end the controversial 1950s hunt for american communists known as the "red scare," has died, cbs broadcasting announced on monday. he was 90.
document.title: wershba, pioneer tv newsman who exposed "red scare," dies
